message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120.

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I can see you're willing to pay a good price, but I was thinking more along the lines of $160. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit, after all.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140. I'm trying to stay within my budget.
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I need to make a profit. I'm thinking of a price of $155. Let me know if that works for you.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I was thinking more along the lines of $145. I'm trying to stay within my budget.
